name: svelte-rating-svg
description: Build scalable stars-rating component for Svelte.
readme: #### Easy to use, run and install [Svelte](https://github.com/sveltejs/svelte) component for building SVG stars-rating. It can be used to make unlimited stars with fractional rating and any colors. Component compatible with Server Side Rendering (SSR). ## Installation ```bash npm install svelte-rating-svg ``` ## Usage ```svelte ``` ## Properties | Property | Description | Type | Default | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **value** | Value between 0 and 1 | Number | 0 | | **color** | Color of stars | String | red | | **max** | Maximum number of stars | Number | 5 | | **duration** | Transition duration in milliseconds | Number | 1000 | ## Examples | Code | Result | | --- | --- | | `` | ![rating-0.5-3-green.svg](https://svelte-rating-svg.vercel.app/rating-0.5-3-green.svg) | | `` | ![rating-0.9-5-#AAA.svg](https://svelte-rating-svg.vercel.app/rating-0.9-5-%23AAA.svg) | | `` | ![rating-0.4321-1-red.svg](https://svelte-rating-svg.vercel.app/rating-0.4321-1-red.svg) |
